sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"重新获得，重新找到，恢复"之意。
means: recover ： 普通用词，含义广，可泛指收回去的物质的或精神的东西，也指无意中找到失物。
reclaim ： 主要指回收或利用废物。
restore ： 指建筑物、工艺品恢复原状，也指健康、能力等的恢复。
regain ： 着重指通过努力使失去的东西复得。

sentence.Network_en: What I've tried very subtly to do is to reclaim language.
sentence.Network_cn: 我费尽心机在做的就是改造、拯救语言。

sentence.Network_en: "I've come to reclaim my property," she announced to the desk clerk.
sentence.Network_cn: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentence.Network_en: In 1986, they got the right to reclaim South African citizenship.
sentence.Network_cn: 1986年，他们取得了恢复南非公民身份的权利。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (used in falconry in the sense recall): from Old French reclamer, from Latin reclamare 'cry out against', from re- 'back' + clamare 'to shout'

entry.def: If you reclaim something that you have lost or that has been taken away from you, you succeed in getting it back.

example.ex: In 1986, they got the right to reclaim South African citizenship...
example.tran: 1986年，他们取得了恢复南非公民身份的权利。

example.ex: 'I've come to reclaim my property,' she announced to the desk clerk.
example.tran: “我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

entry.def: If you reclaim an amount of money, for example tax that you have paid, you claim it back.

example.ex: There are an estimated eight million people currently thought to be eligible to reclaim income tax.
example.tran: 估计现在有800万人有资格申请所得税退税。

entry.tran: 开垦（荒地）；开拓（耕地或建筑用地）
entry.def: When people reclaim land, they make it suitable for a purpose such as farming or building, for example by draining it or by building a barrier against the sea.

example.ex: The Netherlands has been reclaiming farmland from water.
example.tran: 荷兰人一直在围海造地。

example.ex: ...a scheme to build a residential development on 1,100 acres of reclaimed land in Tokyo Bay.
example.tran: 在东京湾通过围海造地开拓的1,100英亩土地上建造住宅区的计划

entry.tran: 使（农田、建筑用地）重新变成（沙漠、森林或海洋）
entry.def: If a piece of land that was used for farming or building is reclaimed by a desert, forest, or the sea, it turns back into desert, forest, or sea.

example.ex: The diamond towns are gradually being reclaimed by the desert...
example.tran: 这些钻石城镇正逐渐重归沙漠。

example.ex: This method of spraying would allow the land to be reclaimed by the rain forests.
example.tran: 这种喷洒法可以使土地重新变成雨林。

entry.def: If you reclaim a person who has been involved in bad or criminal behaviour, you cause them to stop acting in that way.

example.ex: He set out to fight the drug infestation of Omaha by reclaiming a youth from the local gangs.
example.tran: 他从挽救当地帮派的一个年轻人入手着力消除奥马哈的毒品泛滥问题。

means.word_mean: 3. bring, lead, or force to abandon a wrong or evil course of life, conduct, and adopt a right one;
4. make useful again; transform from a useless or uncultivated state;
5. overcome the wildness of; make docile and tractable;

auth_sentence.res_content: It was heartbreak in the baggage reclaim hall.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was heartbreak in the baggage reclaim hall.

auth_sentence.content: Such people will use all means to reclaim their independence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such people will use all means to reclaim their independence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such people will use all means to reclaim their independence.

auth_sentence.content: Gira and his band know how to reclaim well-worn moves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gira and his band know how to reclaim well-worn moves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gira and his band know how to reclaim well-worn moves.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声
acclaim[[v.欢呼;喝采]]→n.喝采,称赞
declaim[[v.朗诵;谴责]]→n.慷慨演说;雄辩
exclaim[[v.叫喊;大声说]]→n.叫喊;感叹
proclaim[[v.公布;声明]]省鷑.宣告;宣言
reclaim[[v.收回,开垦]]→n.收复;矫正
claim呼喊,叫喊→n.&v.要求;论断
ac一再+claim呼喊,叫喊→一再喊→欢呼
ex出+claim呼喊,叫喊→喊出→叫出
pro在前+claim呼喊,叫喊→在前面喊→公布
re回+claim呼喊,叫喊→喊回来→收回来,引申为开荒

means.word_mean: 要求收回；取回；拿回；要求归还

sentences.en: I have tried to reclaim my money without success.

means.word_mean: 开拓，开垦，利用，改造（荒地）

sentences.en: People here are reclaim-ing land from the sea.
sentences.cn: 这儿的人们正在填海拓地。

means.word_mean: 从废料中回收(有用的材料)

sentences.en: He has invented a new method to reclaim valuable raw materials from industrial waste water.
sentences.cn: 他发明了一种从工业废水中回收有价值原料的新方法。

jushi.english: The library reclaimed the book he borrowed a year ago.
jushi.chinese: 图书馆要求他归还一年前借去的那本书。

jushi.english: The farmer reclaimed the swamp by draining it.
jushi.chinese: 农民通过排涝来开垦那块沼泽地。
